item.title: Statistical Regularity
item.description: Statistical Regularity A heuristic or feature, like GPA References (References:: undefined)

item.title: Z Score
item.description: Z Score The number of standard deviations from the mean. ( x – µ ) / σ References (References:: undefined)

item.title: Long Tailed Distributions
item.description: Long Tailed Distributions A long tail distribution has tails that taper off gradually rather than drop off sharply. The head often accounts for way more than the sum of everything else combined.

item.title: Bayesian Rationality
item.description: Bayesian Rationality Priors become posterior over time as more information is introduced. Over time, one “updates” their priors as they become posterior.
